summary: From the Chicago suburbs, an American teenager helps run the Syrian revolution. With social media, she helps her network expose regime atrocities. But as the violence rages everyone must choose their weapon: Facebook or AK-47s.
cast: Ala'a Basatneh|Aous Al-Mubarak|Bassel Shehadeh|Mazhar 'Omar' Tayara|David Gorodyansky|Sascha Meinrath|Zaynep Tufekci|Kurt Andersen|Wael Ghonim|Louie Basatneh|Maher Basatneh|Bashar al-Assad|Amr Al-Azm|Hafez al-Assad|James Galvin|Clay Shirky|Vint Cerf|Jillian York|Kofi Annan|David Cameron|Hillary Clinton|Anderson Cooper|Amy Goodman|Barack Obama|Nicolas Sarkozy|Barbara Walters|Brian Williams
title: #chicagoGirl: The Social Network Takes on a Dictator
